rooms.description: A spacious entrance with ample natural light through large windows and sliding doors.
Large living area focused on natural light and ventilation. Features large windows along the facade for optimum sunlight.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed with an open plan layout allowing natural airflow.
Modern kitchen design integrated with indoor dining space. Features ample window openings for ventilation.
Spacious gym area equipped with essential workout equipment. Designed to allow natural light and cross-ventilation.
A quiet reading space with floor-to-ceiling windows for ample daylight. The placement respects Vastu by aligning with the northeast corner of the plot.
Cozy guest room with natural light and ventilation. Designed for comfort.
Functional bathroom with efficient ventilation and natural light through frosted glass windows.

openings.description: Large door opening ensuring easy access and enhanced natural airflow.
High windows to maximize natural light and cross ventilation in the living area.
Floor-to-ceiling windows that align with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Window overlooking the swimming pool area ensuring natural light and ventilation in adjoining spaces.

additional_features.description: Located on the east side of the plot for optimal sunlight exposure. Designed with safety and ease of access in mind.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with large windows and cross ventilation. Features a private balcony oriented eastward for morning sunlight.
Quiet study space with natural light from multiple sources and proper ventilation.
Modern ensuite bathroom designed for privacy and efficiency in the master bedroom area.
Additional bedroom space with ample natural light and ventilation.

openings.description: Balconies on the upper floor to enhance natural lighting and provide outdoor views.
Large windows ensuring continuous cross ventilation throughout the living spaces.

vastu_considerations.description: The main entrance is positioned in the north to invite positive energy flow.
Located in the northeast corner to align with Vastu principles for knowledge and prosperity.

building_norms.description: The design maximizes available space on a 60x90 feet plot while ensuring compliance with local zoning laws.
All rooms are designed to maximize natural light and cross ventilation, in accordance with Indian architectural standards.
